name: jebcolors
description: JebColors is a personal module I made to use colors in a easier mode in react-native, stores the hexadecimal values of a lot of colors, like bootstrap colors, console colors or the module own colors.

scripts.watchcolors: npm run generatejson && npx serve test
scripts.prerelease: npm run getgradients && npm run generatejson && npm run compile
scripts.release: standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish

author: jebbarbas
